page.title: 12SHOPS AND BUSINESSES IN BARR
page.content: Trade in the area is found only in the confines of the village. One business which relies basically on the villagers is the local store/post office.Four part-timers are employed on a rota basis.Certain goods (newspapers and milk) are delivered to the store daily from Girvan by service bus. A road haulage company has its headquarters in the village but only employs two local drivers to drive the school taxis. The two hotels are family-run businesses and rely heavily on tourism. The estate of Alton Albany receives a small income from shooting and renting summer cottages.
